column5: 24hrs checkin with code access, near exit off I-20, making airport, downtown Dallas and Fort Worth, six flags, cowboys stadium, just 15-20 min ride. Soap, towels (9counts), shampoo, shower cap, face towels(9 counts), clean bed sheet, kitchen with limited supplies, free wifi, Netflix, grill, plenty parking, pool, sunny patio, golf course view, spacious Texan bedrooms, and back yard, for your luxury stay.
